d.Value: Limited review due to the presence of a vehicle and/or temporary snow shelter (Tempo).
Limited review due to snow/ice accumulation.
Not visualised due to snow/ice accumulation. We recommend obtaining declaration from the seller concerning the condition of the driveway.
Cracks noted.  We recommend repairing and sealing these cracks to prevent possible damages due to water infiltration.
Deterioration noted.  We recommend repairs be performed to prevent further damages.

Heaving noted.  As a result, water does not drain to the pit and/or may infiltrate under the garage door. We recommend repairs be performed to prevent possible damages due to water infiltration.  We recommend consulting a licensed contractor as required.
Negative slope noted. Risk of water infiltration into the garage. We recommend correcting to move water away from the structure and/or garage slab.

The pavement has been installed too high and covers part of the siding. Ideally, the foundation should exceed the surface of the driveway by 6 inches. Risk of potential damage to the structure/siding due to water infiltration and/or humidity build-up behind the siding. We recommend verifying the condition of the structure/siding and correcting as required to prevent possible damages.
We recommend sealing the joint between the driveway and the wall/garage slab to prevent possible damages due to water infiltration.
We recommend consulting a licensed contractor to further evaluate/correct this condition.
